answers.author: Jamie Ludovic
answers.text:
check out the Village of Downers Grove (www.downers.us) Long Range Financial Plan Page (search for it on their web). It goes through a series of steps and a final plan

author: Angel Smith
text:
The City of River Falls is looking for example 5-Year Fiscal Plans. If your municipality has one could you please forward a copy of it to me?
Thanks!
title: 5-Year Fiscal Plans
